name: A New Home +
description:
Markiplier has just moved into a new house. And so far it seems his first week has been going well. But recently he's been acting odd, maybe it's the pressure of his celebrity status, the dust in the attic, or maybe cause his hair needs more gel.

That doesn't matter since a ghost is trying to get his body.

So can you find out what this ghost wants? Or will you submit to your fate at the hands of the unknown?

Hope you guys enjoy this remastered edition of A New Home!

CREDITS:
